00054 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00055 namespace RODOS {
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 ///To receive data from a single UDP port (socket) - abstraction layer.
00059 class UDPIn {
00060     /// socket API, used internally for the HW Implementation
00061     UDPReceiver udpRx;
00062 public:
00063     /** Constructor, opens an UDP connection to the given port
00064      * @param[in] portNr port number on localhost used for reception
00065      */
00066     UDPIn(const long portNr);
00067 
00068 
00069     /** Constructor, opens an UDP connection to the given port
00070      * and incommig messages will be distriputed in the given topic
00071      * The get method is is the case not accecible!
00072      * Warning: The distribution is from Interrupt server, please use
00073      * Subscriber::putFromInterrupt(...)
00074      * do not supend (no semaphore, no yield, etc) in this method!
00075      */
00076     UDPIn(const long portNr, Topic<GenericMsgRef>* associatedTopic);
00077 
00078     void setAsync(Topic<GenericMsgRef>* associatedTopic);
00079 
00080     /** Opens a socket for UDP reception.
00081      * On success attribute 'initialised' is set true.
00082      * @param[in] portNr port number on localhost
00083      */
00084     void reopen(const long portNr);
00085 
00086     /**
00087      * Receives data from UDP socket. Writes data up to maxLen to userData.
00088      * @param[in,out] userData pointer to input buffer
00089      * @param[in] maxLen size of input buffer
00090      * @return length of message written to userData
00091      */
00092     long get(void* userData, int maxLen);
00093 
00094     /**
00095      * Receives data from UDP socket. Writes data up to maxLen to userData.
00096      * @param[in,out] userData pointer to input buffer
00097      * @param[in] maxLen size of input buffer
00098      * @param[out] ipaddr sender address
00099      * @return length of message written to userData
00100      */
00101     long get(void* userData, int maxLen, unsigned long *ipaddr);
00102 
00103     /**
00104      * Check for incoming data.
00105      * @return true - if data is available, false - otherwise
00106      */
00107     bool readyToGet();
00108 
00109     /**
00110      * Check whether port is active or not.
00111      * @return true - connected, false - not connected
00112      */
00113     bool isConnected();
00114 };
00115 
00116 
00117 
00118 
00119 ///To send data to a single UPD port (socket) - abstraction layer.
00120 class UDPOut {
00121     /// socket API, used internally for the HW Implementation
00122     UDPTransmitter udpTx;
00123 public:
00124 
00125     /** Constructor for connection to remote host known by name.
00126          * WARNING: Negativ port number uses the abs port number and sends broadcast
00127      * @param portNr port number on remote host, negativ -> broadcast to this port
00128      * @param hostname IP-hostname of remote host
00129      */
00130     UDPOut(const long portNr, const char* hostname = "localhost");
00131 
00132     /** Constructor for connection to remote host known by IP-address.
00133      * @param _portNr port number on remote host
00134      * @param _ipAddr IP-address of remote host, e.g. format as hex 0x01020304,
00135      * where 01 = ip_part1, ...
00136      */
00137     UDPOut(const long _portNr, unsigned long _ipAddr); //MSul
00138 
00139     /** Constructor for connection to remote host known by IP-address.
00140      * @param _portNr port number on remote host
00141      * @param ip0, ip1, ip2, ip3 IP-address of remote host consisting of separate octets
00142      */
00143     UDPOut(const long _portNr, int ip0, int ip1, int ip2, int ip3);//MSul
00144 
00145     /** Send user data
00146      * @param[in] userData pointer to output data stream
00147      * @param[in] maxLen size of data block to be send, must be <= max allowed length
00148      * @return true - if sending was successful, false - otherwise
00149      */
00150     bool send(const void* userData, const int maxLen);
00151 
00152     /** Send user data to a given address
00153      * @param[in] userData pointer to output data stream
00154      * @param[in] maxLen size of data block to be send, must be <= max allowed length
00155      * @param[in] ipAddr new IP-address, where data is send to
00156      * @return true - if sending was successful, false - otherwise
00157      */
00158     bool sendTo(const void* userData, const int maxLen, unsigned long ipAddr);//MSul
00159 
00160     /**
00161          * Check whether port is active or not.
00162          * @return true - connected, false - not connected
00163          */
00164     bool isConnected();
00165 };
00166 
00167 
00168 class UDPInOut {
00169 public:
00170 
00171     UDPIn udpIn;
00172     UDPOut udpOut;
00173 
00174     bool isBroadcastLink;
00175 
00176     UDPInOut(int broadcastPort);
00177     UDPInOut(int port,const char* hostname );
00178     UDPInOut(int localInputPort, int remoteOutputPort,const  char* hostname);
00179 };
